VGServer::AttributeIdException

VGServer::AttributeIdException Class Reference
[Exceptions thrown by various parts of the library]

AttributeIdException is thrown by setVertexAttr and setEdgeAttr functions when supplied with an invalid attribute id. More...

#include <AttributeProperties.h>

Detailed Description

AttributeIdException is thrown by setVertexAttr and setEdgeAttr functions when supplied with an invalid attribute id.
